unnormalised: Oh ho! Cart abandonment? It's like seeing samosas left on a plate at a wedding! What a tragedy! Did they suddenly remember the EMI due on their Bajaj scooter? Maybe auntyji called at 11:30 AM on 26/01/2023 saying "Beta, buy from your local dukaan!" or perhaps they saw a better deal on Flipkart during their 3 PM, 16/07/2024 sale? Retailers, time for some *jugaad* to keep those carts from becoming *khali*!
normalised: Oh ho! Cart abandonment? It's like seeing samosas left on a plate at a wedding! What a tragedy! Did they suddenly remember the E M I due on their Bajaj scooter? Maybe auntyji called at eleven thirty A M on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three saying "Beta, buy from your local dukaan!" or perhaps they saw a better deal on Flipkart during their three P M, sixteenth July two thousand and twenty four sale? Retailers, time for some jugaad to keep those carts from becoming khali!
